SeriesHeading: Advanced Studio Students must take courses within their primary studio area. The studio areas are: ceramics, drawing, installation, painting, photography, printmaking, and sculpture. All advanced-level studio courses must be at the 400 level.

PreReq: ART 100 or ART 101, Jr. status or consent
